alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brevard and east central Osceola Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Kenansville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Malabar, Camp Holly Fish Camp and West Melbourne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard
